text: Ana mben kov vugim, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Zisas vugi ŋaneŋ kaŋgiap, mbe ana zɨn vegi. Mbe ana zɨn vegim, ana mbe gangiap, mben ndikndigap, mbaram Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨnga, mbe ana piin kɨrga buni vhuuiŋ bun mbe nzuai. Ana mba bunin mbe nzuav, mba rɨmrɨɨ ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben kurkurav, mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzi.
